title: Kiss Man Person Medium Skin Tone Light Skin Tone
description: Illustrates a romantic kiss between a man and a person, with a light skin tone. It symbolizes love, connection, and gentle affection.
apple_vendor_description: Apple's rendition of the man kissing a person emoji showcases a gentle embrace with a focus on tender emotion, featuring a medium and a light skin tone.  The characters are sculpted with Apple's characteristic smooth gradients and soft, rounded forms, highlighting the intimacy of the moment with subtle, realistic lighting.  This emoji, a symbol of romantic partnership and deep affection, beautifully expresses love and unity on Apple devices.
